While this game can be difficult to get into, when you do get into it, it becomes a enjoyable experience. It is easy to learn, difficult to master. If you are easily frustrated and can't get over that, I would say this is not the game for you, but if you like playing fun games with friends with a lot to do, this would be the game for you, Overall, 100% 10/10 would buy again.

Jogo bastante diferenciado em que você pode encarnar um assassino contra quatro sobreviventes (ou ser um desses sobreviventes). Os assassinos são bem diferentes entre si, os sobreviventes nem tanto, mas há diversas opções de customização de poderes (vantagens, itens, complementos, oferendas). É um jogo rápido que pode ser encaixado em qualquer horário do dia em que você consiga um tempinho, não exigindo uma dedicação absurda, ao mesmo tempo que proporcionando muitas horas de experimentação, descobertas e caçadas, recompensando seu tempo com mais vantagens, mas sempre muito divertido. Já jogo há um ano e é muito difícil enjoar!

The game is a surprising amount of fun even if you're not into horror. You'll work as either a team trying to escape or as a killer trying to pay tribute but either way good times will be had.

Pros:
1. Easy to get into to and has a tutorial to help guide new players.
2. Addictive gameplay with rounds that generally don't overstay their welcome.
3. Tense atmosphere lends itself to further enjoyment.

Cons:
1. Can be tricky to find matches as the killer and matchmaking could be better.
2. The game has a mobile game approach to unlocking new characters, you might have everything unlocked by your 277th birthday.
3. CAMPERS!!!! (Okay this one is one the players not the game itself)

Новое обновление=разрыв мозга. Чтобы продолжать дальше играть в это,необходимо пройти все стадии принятия неизбежного: отрицание, гнев, депрессию и смирение. Вот только надо ли оно вам? Из плюсов обновы можно выделить только классный апгрейд карт,улучшенную оптимизацию и плавные скилчеки. На этом,пожалуй все. Кому мешали прежние анимации персонажей - неясно. Если к обновленному интерфейсу еще возможно как-то привыкнуть, то бегать за обделавшихся сурвов (именно так выглядят их модельки) совсем не хочется. Как жаль,что на негативные отзывы и просьбы постоянных игроков всем насрать,что даже после птб никто не прислушался и не постарался ДОВЕСТИ НОВЫЕ АНИМАЦИИ ДО УМА. Это однозначно полный провал
p.s. ПОФИКСИТЕ НАКОНЕЦ КИЛОМЕТРОВЫЕ НЕАДЕКВАТНЫЕ ХИТБОКСЫ

Good

I've liked this game since I first tried it. The assymetrical gameplay of Survivors vs Killer is real fun.
I mainly play killer myself and it comes down to me enjoying trying to spook others.

The game has it's flaws, but the fun I have overshadow them for the most part.
Most players are nice but there's a lot of bad eggs in the DbD community, hellbent on making the experience miserable for the opponent rather than fun. This goes for both killer and survivor players.

Personally I try to adjust my playstyle depending on the survivors. If I notice I keep downing the same survivor with little effort, or even all of them, I will start to just chase for a while and then leave to look for someone else rather than downing them. That way they get the horror movie feeling of being chased by something more powerful but also the feeling they might just get away.

Some survivors play in ways design to infuriate the killer and I can see that the idea is to make sure your team survives, but some like to taunt excessively and such and it just sours the fun. That said, when you finally manage to body that person it feels awesome :D

Overall I'd say the game has more good than bad, there's a rather big library of survivors and killers to pick from now, all their own base perks which can be unlocked so that all survivors/killers can use them. The characters that come with the base game are good enough, the huntress is a lot of fun if you wanna be killer, but I'd recommend reading through the info on the new killers and survivors and pick up their respective dlc pack during a sale. 

I rate the game 8/10.

BITTE HELFEN SIE MIR!?

まず断っておこうと思うが、このゲームは基本的にマッチングがビミョーである。
なので最初に上級者と当たってしまい「あ～すぐ殺されるわ、つまんね」「誰も釣れないんだけど？上手すぎだろふざけんな」
「こっちはPark揃ってねぇんだぞ」
と、言うかもしれないという人は、回れ右して別のゲームでも買ったほうが良い。
そんなレビューでゲームの評価を下げるなら猶更だ。

ここからは、このゲームの楽しさについて語る・・・のは、他の方々がやっているので省略（youtubeなんかにもあるし）
購入を検討している人、ちょっと気になってとりあえずレビューを見に来た人、動画を見たことはあるけど難しそうでやる勇気が・・・って人向けに、やってない人が勘違いしてそうなことを書き記しておく。

生存者サイド
・まずこのゲームは、『鬼ごっこゲー』ではない
実況者の動画を見てると、皆大体殺人鬼から逃げ回っているけど、あんなのはしなくても良い。ってかできるもんじゃない。
そもそも生存者の目的は、『発電機を修理し、脱出する』ことであって、殺人鬼と鬼ごっこに興じることではない。
逆に言えば、チェイス（鬼ごっこのdbd用語版）が下手でも、隠れるのが上手ければなんの問題もないということだ。
チェイスというのは、「必要に駆られ仕方なくする」ことである。だから、「チェイス難しそう・・・」としり込みする必要はない。やってりゃ慣れるし、ある程度進めてParkが揃ってきたら、隠密極振り構成でも良いわけだしね。

殺人鬼サイド
・殺人鬼をいきなりプレイするのは得策ではない
殺人鬼というのは、dbdでは孤高の存在。動画で見る分には、実に鮮やかに生存者を追い詰めそして全滅させる。
しかしゲームの特性上、たった一人で四人もの生存者を相手どらなければならない。
自分のケツは自分で拭くしかないということだ。
そんな殺人鬼をレベル１でいきなりプレイしたとしても、Parkが一つしか装備できない関係で大したことはできないどころか、生存者に煽られてしまうかもしれない。
それでキレてやめるぐらいなら、サバイバーでコツコツとマップを覚えたりポイントを貯めたりした後に、プレイするべきだろう。

・キャンプもトンネルも、全て戦術。遠慮する必要はない。
dbdでは、嫌われる行為の一部としてキラーのキャンプやトンネルが挙げられる。
キャンプ・・・生存者を釣った後、その場に待機して救助させないようにすること。
トンネル・・・一人の生存者を狙い続け、早期に退場させること。
こういうことをした後に、生存者側からの嫌味なチャットが来るかもしれないが『全く』気にしなくていい。黙殺するべきだ。
初心者やオンラインゲームに慣れてない人は委縮してしまうかもしれないが、少し考えてみるといい。
「キャンプ」や「トンネル」をされ、暴言を吐くプレイヤーは、キラーに対して煽ったりライトでスタンを入れたり、パーティーを組んで全員でVCを繋いで有利に事を進めたりしないのだろうか？
答えは否だ。そういう連中ほど、自分に有利になることはゲーム性を無視してでもやり、自分に不利になることは叩く。
もし暴言を吐かれたならこう思うといい。「お鯖様（生存者至上主義なプレイヤー）がまたこんなこと言ってんなぁ～」と。

長々と書いてしまったが、これがゲームプレイに少しでも役立たせて貰えたなら嬉しい。
そしてここまで読んでくれた、購入を検討している人へ一言。
「儀式の場で、会おう。」

Dead By Daylight способна затянуть на долгие часы геймплея. Несмотря на всю интересность игры, хотелось бы в большей степени поговорить об отрицательных сторонах, которые сохраняются в этом продукте по крайней мере на данный момент.

По какой-то причине, играть за маньяка намного тяжелее чем за выжившего. Возможно дело в командной работе четырех выживших, а возможно в недостаточной скорости маньяков, качестве их навыков, но все сводится к тому, что маньяк - это единственный человек, который, играя в игру, действительно отдается полностью геймплею, потеет и нервничает. Получилось так, что маньяк вынужден разгонять выживших, у которых очень немало преимуществ, таким образом игра за убийцу становится сущим кошмаром.

Еще, здесь очень сложно играть в одиночку за выживших. С друзьями игра становится намного легче, ведь каждое действие согласовывается. При игре со случайными игроками, многие забивают на альтруизм и играют для себя, а возможность следить за действиями друг друга минимальна.

Что в одиночку за выжившего, что за маньяка, разгоняющего выживших, игра очень трудна.
На деле, в этом кроется главная отрицательная сторона Dead By Daylight - баланс имеется, но его как бы и нет (в отношении маньяка и выживших).
Еще есть читеры, неадекватные игроки (благо возможности использовать аудиосвязь в игре нет). В остальном, это игра, пытающаяся быть хоррором, у которой это не получается. Еще тактически-стратегическое мышление развивает.

"Briliant concept, wasted potential."
I really didn't wanted to update my review because calling the developers and the community what and how they are was a quick resume to what it really feels like playing Dead by Daylight for over 100hrs which compared to other players it's only the beginning, but after being permanently banned from the games Steam HUB for a pathetic reason I said that maybe I should describe the game and what it makes it so bad. 
First of all, the game is not that bad. It has some issues that will never be fixed and a very bad and weak anti cheat system. But beside that the game runs well and it's great.
Second of all the main reason why this game is so bad are:The developers and it's community.
The developers literally deny every bug and issue this game has and they think that it's fine. It's not. With every new DLC new perks arrive and the perks number increase, just like the possibility for more builds. Toxic builds. There are so many toxic and annoying perks in the game, perks that are ruining the fun.
Talking of which let's talk about the community. Every single soul its toxic af. Every single player and moderator. The chances of stumbling into normal players are beyond any possibility. Every killer relies to facecamp and tunneling if they are weak. Gameplays that are ruining the survivors game. Survivors are using toxic perks which makes the killer either rage quit or running after them untill every gen is done. Gen rushing is a very common thing sadly and you realise it only after you down that toxic player you were running after. I could go on with many other toxic gameplays but I want to mention the 3rd factor that ruins the game :Cheaters.
Since the anti cheat system is weak, they are in the game swarming every single game and the developers are not even bothering themselfs with them. So we stumble into them. You really can't do nothing against them beside being completely destroyed or just quit but you are banned 5 minutes from playing.
The cheats differ from the person running faster, doing gens faster, healing faster. Many hacks can't even be noticed by players. Same goes for killers with the speed and the damage they do to gens when they kick them. 
And that's it. If you haven't touched the game yet, then stay away. Far away from it. The chances of staying and playing the game are 50% and even so it will be a love-hate relation.

A killer first stabbed me, then had a change of heart and carried me to the hatch through which I escaped. This game has all kinds of funny randomness, but the games can also get intense. Also the leveling system is nice, you basically level up through unlocking rewards.

** 2022 Edit **
Still extremely survivor oriented. Survivors get all the "break free" addons, perks and buffs while killers get practically nothing. The toxicity is a joke and devs clearly don't care about the game, only trying to cash in as much as they can before the game loses enough players to shut it down. Devs even go after critical content creators and clearly don't know how their own game works or how to balance it.

Get a swf team and just completely trash the killer and then be toxic in post chat about it, 7/10 games.

Also cheats are getting more and more common as if survivors didn't have it easy enough.


** Old Review **
10+ minute Q times as a killer. Way too hard to find and track survivors as killer unless you actually find them. If you are unlucky enough to face a team of survivors who communicate, forget being able tio kill them, yet alone hook them and keep them there. No wonder people play as survivors since it gives you a 99% win rate.
Randomly disconnects from the server so you lose all progress and get no XP.

Edit 1: End of 2020 and queue times are still longer than matches if you play killer.
Lately I've just given up trying to kill the entire survivor team, I just camp the one or two I manage to hook. Devs favour survivors, no question about it. Playing survivor should be a teamwork, if you get ONE good survivor that can clear all generators without failure, killer is done for. The stupid slow downs for killers should go or be redone. It makes no sense, except for a survivor standpoint, giving them yet another way to escape.
And remove the stupid hatch!
Игра очеь классная
Love this game so much, one of my favorite survival horror games out there. Nothing can beat this, 10/10 never gets boring, always new stuff getting added!!

Playing this game can be really fun especially with friends and even playing solo. Keep in mind some of the killers are a bit op but there's always a way to counter them. The characters unique perks can be shared among other characters once you hit a certain level and that in itself is really nice especially when trying to make the perfect survivor. All this being said, not every match will be a fun one. There are some face camping killers that can really make you want to alt F4 but with the right teammates that too can be countered... Teammates can also be pretty toxic as well when playing with just strangers as they will ignore you while you've been hooked and leave you to die  but you'll most likely have very few run in's with that although when you do i can't  guarantee you wont be frustrated... but dont let that make you uninstall, there are super good team players in this game more than unhelpful ones. This game all in all is a fun time, Hope this helps!

Not really a horror game

刚买下这个游戏的时候，我是深深被吸引了也破了一些财，在游戏里准备玩好，然后这个游戏流淌进了新血液，现在随着版本的改动，整个游戏内素质环境都乌烟瘴气，玩不起的人太多了，玩不起呢？又想赢 这该怎么办？一些人类玩家就专门钻到你的留言板里来人身攻击，就是有百万种借口不承认自己弱，只对屠夫指指点点，真当自己是回事，

接下来说正事了，首先匹配机制，段位方面老是出错，哎呀，明明有打过的记录，就是不计算段位，段位出错 等你这游戏没发挥好掉段的时候，他就给你掉段，气不气人?还要忍受着玩家之间“友好”的交流，我不是单边玩家，屠夫也好人类也好，我给大家讲解下屠夫吧，排队排一年奖励（血点）一丢丢，只能靠着段位踏过死区，才能来到稍微正常一点环境里，但问题又来了，人类喜欢拔线中赛退出，这会导致你分数不够，甚至掉段，出来后还能骂你，真爽，而我也是在这个游戏里，立下了目标，成为一名护士长，但这次改版把护士削成了白板，我真不知道我玩护士是怎么坚持下来的，里面越是，靠近顶尖的屠夫越容易招来骂声，而越顶尖的屠夫难度就越大，就好比一些能秀的，和实用铁憨憨之间对比，实习护士是真的弱，玩护士的人承受着压力很大，加上人类玩家的谩骂 游戏机制的不公，奖励非常少这种排队排一年，几乎每场都变成了练习局，只要你玩巧了，人类就敢骂你，你坚持下来，你也变强了，那好了，现在好了削弱了Yeah最强屠夫削弱成屎了，人类是亲儿子，屠夫玩家都是npc，竟然都不拿屠夫当人了，人类这边那也有疯狂抱怨的理由，高配守尸打针对还是带处决，有人类高配道具车队强吗？几套道具都砸到脸上了，技能挨个车轮战，“哎呀呀，屠夫打针对 ”毁灭打击 ，钢筋铁骨 ，怀表 自摸4个人一块带哪个不能打车轮战?还有逆天道具呢，逆天道具道具都是爹可惜菜是原罪，技能都不会搭配就出来嘛，就出来断章取义，谁强谁弱?在综合上来说，真的指望4v1，你一个人的平均值顶对方一个玩家?那你队友吃瓜呗，你一个人就是超级英雄，屠夫就是反派，屠夫就不是人活该被欺负，打不过就出来人身攻击，活该被车队碾，然后被迫玩人，唉真是的…凭什么？人类要所有版本都得强势，屠夫不应该受益，加大力度
Fajna gierka z dreszczykiem emocji xD :D
